job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: If you are an Embedded Software Engineer with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltbrgtPerform as a Software Design engineer working independently to achieve highquality software design per customer requirementsltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this PositionltbrgtltbrgtMinimum Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineeringltbrgtltbrgt Proficient in C programmingltbrgtltbrgt Proficient in System and Software Designltbrgtltbrgt At least 3 years of embedded software experience including the ability to work independently and participate in peer reviewsltbrgtltbrgt Familiarity with CMMI or ASPICE software development processltbrgtltbrgt Excellent communication skills including the ability to communicate technical details and document software designltbrgtltbrgt At least 5 years of embedded software experienceltbrgtltbrgt Automotive Experience with Tier1 Supplier or OEM CAN LIN Diagnosticsltbrgtltbrgt Experience in AUTOSAR software developmentltbrgtltbrgtWhats In It for YoultbrgtltbrgtThis position is on a contract basis for 1224 monthsltbrgtltbrgtSo if you are a Automotive Engineer with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtWendyAlvaradoCyberCoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  WA11604587  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtWendy Alvarado  Sr Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right to Workltstronggt  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
